subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Loren Roberts had four birdies on the back nine and shot a three-under-par 68, extending his lead to two strokes after two rounds of the Commerce Bank Championship in East Meadow, N.Y. David Eger (66) and Scott Simpson (67) shared second at seven-under 135 in the $1.6 million Champions Tour event on the Red Course at Eisenhower Park.
